issue.title: Plasma store modifies hash table while iterating during client disconnect
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1812](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1812). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
ARROW-1788 introduces a bug where, when a client disconnects, we potentially modify the plasma store's hash table of objects while iterating through it.
